name: AMR To MP3 Converter
short_description:
Many modern mobile telephone handsets can store short audio recordings in the AMR format. PCFreeware's Free AMR to MP3 Converter is a windows utility that quickly converts AMR to high quality MP3 audio format. It enables you to Batch-convert unlimited AMR video files to MP3 in the fast and easy way. It is free! It is easy to install and use! it is fast!Converted MP3 files are of high quality! The program runs on a low-to-moderate amount of system resources and quickly finishes a conversion task while managing to keep a very good sound quality. Free AMR To MP3 Converter can convert large batches of AMR files swiftly. 
Software Features: 
- Compatible with All Windows Versions 
- Easy To Install 
- It does not require special knowledge
- Batch-convert unlimited AMR video files to MP3
- Fast Processing Speed
summary: PCFreeware's Free AMR to MP3 Converter is a windows utility that quick
